SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complete_cast AS cc, comp_cast_type AS cct2, cast_info AS ci, movie_info AS mi, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, title AS t WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = cc.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND cct2.id = cc.status_id AND  cct2.kind ='complete+verified' AND  ci.note in ('(writer)', '(head writer)', '(written by)', '(story)', '(story editor)') AND  mi.info in ('Horror', 'Action', 'Sci-Fi', 'Thriller', 'Crime', 'War') ;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complete_cast AS cc, comp_cast_type AS cct2, cast_info AS ci, keyword AS k, movie_info AS mi, movie_keyword AS mk WHERE ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = cc.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND cct2.id = cc.status_id AND  cct2.kind ='complete+verified' AND  ci.note in ('(writer)', '(head writer)', '(written by)', '(story)', '(story editor)') AND  k.keyword in ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital') AND  mi.info in ('Horror', 'Action', 'Sci-Fi', 'Thriller', 'Crime', 'War') ;
